messages.subject: Re: NEW need help please
messages.msgSnippet: I am in Washington DC right now but we move in November. The problem with that is we still have not been told where we are moving yet. Thank you for the link I
messages.messageBody:
I am in Washington DC right now but we move in November. The problem with that is we still have not been told where we are moving yet. Thank you for the link I will check it out. I am still out of my element when it comes to taking my girls out of school. I want to be prepared before we embark on this journey.

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Joyce Fetteroll <jfetteroll@...> wrote:
>
>
> On May 5, 2010, at 1:31 PM, tinakisor wrote:
>
> > But how does one create a portfolio for an unschooler that satisfies
> > the state requirements so that you can keep homeschooling?
>
> There are unschoolers in every state, but how they meet requirements
> varies from state to state so that question is best answered on a
> state unschooling list. If you tell us what state you're in, maybe
> someone can direct you. You might also check here for a state list:
>
> http://sandradodd.com/world#us
>
> Joyce
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] NEW need help please
messages.msgSnippet: ... There are unschoolers in every state, but how they meet requirements varies from state to state so that question is best answered on a state unschooling
messages.messageBody:
On May 5, 2010, at 1:31 PM, tinakisor wrote:

> But how does one create a portfolio for an unschooler that satisfies
> the state requirements so that you can keep homeschooling?

There are unschoolers in every state, but how they meet requirements
varies from state to state so that question is best answered on a
state unschooling list. If you tell us what state you're in, maybe
someone can direct you. You might also check here for a state list:

http://sandradodd.com/world#us

Joyce



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: NEW need help please
messages.msgSnippet: I have 3 children and am considering home schooling. From what I have read so far Unschooling sounds intriguing. My concern however has to do the homeschooling
messages.messageBody: I have 3 children and am considering home schooling. From what I have read so far Unschooling sounds intriguing. My concern however has to do the homeschooling state requirements. It is easy to create a portfolio when you follow a curriculum because there are assignments to be kept. But how does one create a portfolio for an unschooler that satisfies the state requirements so that you can keep homeschooling?
